summary: 2003 CHEV TRAILBLAZER 52,000  MILES.  FUEL SPRAYING FROM UNDER THE VEHICLE WHEN IT IS RUNNING.  DIAGNOSED AS FUEL PUMP HOUSING CORRODED.  COMPLAINT FILED WITH CHEVROLET FOR WARRANTY REPLACEMENT.  REQUEST DENIED, HAD PUMP REPLACED AT LOCAL SHOP.  DID NOT KEEP OLD PART, CAN GET AFFIDAVIT FROM REPAIR SHOP. *TR
